Stuff For Your Palm

24 Feb 2000

Here's a nifty site for your Palm, containing (amongst other things), complete references for Perl, ColdFusion, Python, CGI Environmental Variables and Photoshop Shortcuts.

It also has a bunch of public-domain books and info on more topics than you can shake a stick at.\nHow much memory do I have in my Palm? Probably not enough.
